div.h2: WELCOME TO MAURY COUNTY PUBLIC SCHOOLS
div.p: MCPS would like to welcome you to our website! Each main navigation above is a page and should be clicked on for content. Example: click on Students/Parents for full page of resources. Coordinated School Health, School Nutrition, District Athletics, Pupil Services, Counseling & Mental Health, and Assessment are separate pages with content for that area.

a.title: Big Yellow School Bus Radio Show Hosted By Superintendent Marczak

div.a: Big Yellow School Bus Radio Show Hosted By Superintendent Marczak
Read More about Big Yellow School Bus Radio Show Hosted By Superintendent Marczak
Read More about COVID-19 Preparedness Plan

div.span:
Welcome to MCPS where our mission is to provide the educational instruction, tools, and environment for every child to succeed in LIFE as Lifelong Learners, Independent Thinkers, Fearless Innovators, and Exemplary Citizens. Our district scorecard is based on the community-developed 7 Keys to College and Career Readiness. These Keys tell us what our community wants us to focus on as we push on to positively impact student achievement. The district's strategic plan will guide the district over the next five years as well. Stay up to date on Keys progress and strategic plans here on the district web site.
-Dr. Chris Marczak, Superintendent

div.p: Maury County Public Schools does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. MCPS also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices. The web accessibility statement can be found under About Us.
